## Public Member Functions

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a9ef3feaa598c937267b5c8343c0c09b2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;PPCLowerMASSVEntries.cpp&#125;::PPCLowerMASSVEntries::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp;) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.

If a pass specifies that it uses a particular analysis result to this function, it can then use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;AnalysisType&gt;()</a> function, below.

getPassName - Return a nice clean name for a pass.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.

## Private Member Functions

### handlePowSpecialCases() {#a653cf30b00953d2d432e7a985eabca11}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool PPCLowerMASSVEntries::handlePowSpecialCases (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42; CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; Func, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M)</>}>
If there are proper fast-math flags, this function creates llvm.pow intrinsics when the exponent is 0.25 or 0.75.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppclowermassventries-cpp/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppclowermassventries-cpp">PPCLowerMASSVEntries.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lowerMASSVCall() {#a9ce05d9c7b148f66fdb011c9ca3110a5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool PPCLowerMASSVEntries::lowerMASSVCall (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42; CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; Func, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget">PPCSubtarget</a> &#42; Subtarget)</>}>
Lowers generic MASSV entries to PowerPC subtarget-specific MASSV entries.

e.g.: &#95;&#95;sind2&#95;massv --&gt; &#95;&#95;sind2&#95;P9 for a Power9 subtarget. Both function prototypes and their callsites are updated during lowering.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppclowermassventries-cpp/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppclowermassventries-cpp">PPCLowerMASSVEntries.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

Creates PowerPC subtarget-specific name corresponding to the specified generic MASSV function, and the PowerPC subtarget.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppclowermassventries-cpp/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppclowermassventries-cpp">PPCLowerMASSVEntries.cpp</a>.

### getCPUSuffix() {#a6ccede6d16713e90d7c48d5c62e9e730}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>StringRef PPCLowerMASSVEntries::getCPUSuffix (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget">PPCSubtarget</a> &#42; Subtarget)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns a string corresponding to the specified PowerPC subtarget.

e.g.: &quot;&#95;P8&quot; for Power8, &quot;&#95;P9&quot; for Power9. The string is used as a suffix while generating subtarget-specific MASSV library functions. Current support includes minimum subtarget Power8 for Linux and Power7 for AIX.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppclowermassventries-cpp/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppclowermassventries-cpp">PPCLowerMASSVEntries.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Checks if the specified function name represents an entry in the MASSV library.
